TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SkinBuilder extends System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder
Public NotInheritable Class SkinBuilder Inherits ControlBuilder
public ref class SkinBuilder sealed : System::Web::UI::ControlBuilder

summary.span: 提供 物件，用於設定階段將控制面板套用至控制項。

span.span: Provides a object used at design time to apply control skins to controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 網頁程式開發人員和控制項作者不會使用直接類別。Page developers and control authors do not use the class directly. 使用 ASP.NET 設計工具產生器類別搭配類別和適用於主題和其各自的控制面板控制項在設計階段的介面。ASP.NET designer builders use the class in conjunction with the class and the interface to apply themes and their respective control skins to controls at design time. 若要套用佈景主題，在設計階段，基底類別會呼叫每當建置控制項的子控制項樹狀結構的方法。To apply themes at design time, the base class calls the method whenever a control's child control tree is built.

MemberSignature.Value: public SkinBuilder (System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider provider, System.Web.UI.Control control, System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder skinBuilder, string themePath);

param.name: provider
param.span: 在設計工具環境中，封裝控制項主題資訊的 。

span.span: A that encapsulates theme information for controls in a designer environment.

span.span: The with which the is associated.

param.span: 方法會將控制面板套用至這個控制項，並傳回此控制項。

span.span: The method applies a control skin to this control and returns it.

param.span: 由 為控制項型別所提供的 。

span.span: A provided by the for the control's type.
The absolute path to the theme file.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，並設定與產生器關聯的控制項、由控制項的 物件提供的一般 物件，和主題檔案的路徑。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, setting the control with which the builder is associated, the general object provided by the object for the control, and a path to the theme file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會呼叫方法類別，以傳回物件中指定的控制項`control`參數。This constructor is called by the method of the class to return a object for the control specified in the `control` parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Web.UI.Control ApplyTheme() cil managed

summary.span: 如果 物件與控制項產生關聯，則於設計階段將主題和控制面板套用至目前的控制項。

span.span: Applies a theme and a control skin to the current control at design time, if a object is associated with the control.

returns.span: 已套用主題或樣式表主題和任何控制面板的控制項執行個體。

span.span: The control instance to which the theme or style sheet theme and any control skin was applied.

returns.span: 這是傳遞至產生器 建構函式的同一個執行個體。

span.span: This is the same instance passed to the builder's constructor.

returns.span: 如果沒有任何控制項傳遞至建構函式，則這個方法將會傳回 。

span.span: This method will return if no control was passed to the constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件會與關聯的控制項在設計階段藉由指定執行個體物件的控制項，以提供物件。 objects are associated with controls at design time by specifying an instance for the object of a control that supplies a object. 物件可以傳回特定控制項的物件。The object can return a object for a given control.
